premise: A man in a black coat is walking outdoors.
hypothesis: A man is outside.
explanation_1: man in a black coat implies man

premise: A young girl with two fingers in her mouth sitting next to an older woman.
hypothesis: A young girl and old woman are sitting together.
explanation_1: sitting next to someone can mean sitting together.

premise: A young boy jumping into a still lake
hypothesis: The young boy is by the water.
explanation_1: Young boy is repeated, and a lake is a form of water.

premise: The group of linen dressed men are standing in the street.
hypothesis: The group of people outside.
explanation_1: TEH STREET IS OUTSIDE.   THE PEOPLE ARE MEN.

premise: Three tan dogs run after a tennis ball.
hypothesis: some animals are playing
explanation_1: dogs are animals and "some" describes more than two.

premise: The woman is wearing sunglasses in the middle of a street and is standing next to a RoadWork Ahead sign.
hypothesis: There is a woman outside.
explanation_1: Sunglasses are worn outside.

premise: A man wearing a helmet driving a black race car down the street
hypothesis: a guy is outdoors
explanation_1: Man is a guy and he is in street so he is outdoors.

premise: Two men are sitting at a desk and one man is touching the jacket of one of the first men.
hypothesis: There are two men that are sitting.
explanation_1: Two men are sitting at a desk therefor they are sitting.

premise: A blond woman and a toddler are posing for a picture.
hypothesis: The woman is wearing a dress.
explanation_1: We don't know that the woman is wearing a dress.

premise: A man is walking down the sidewalk to his destination as he reaches inside his pocket.
hypothesis: A man is walking to work.
explanation_1: The man isn't necessarily walking to work.

premise: A small boy wearing red runs towards a soccer ball.
hypothesis: A boy is playing with other children.
explanation_1: The boy possibly is playing alone and not with other children.

premise: Men are walking with a pack of dogs.
hypothesis: Men are using a dogsled.
explanation_1: Walking with dogs does not imply using a doglsed.

premise: The man is parasailing and doing a trick.
hypothesis: The man is a street performer.
explanation_1: Nothing about a man parasailing indicates that he is a street performer.

premise: A large group of people gathered outside of a building.
hypothesis: the people are women
explanation_1: There is no evidence that any of the people in this large group are women. They may all be men.

premise: This woman is sitting in a lawnchair on the sand.
hypothesis: A woman is at the beach
explanation_1: woman  sitting in a lawn chair on the sand doesn't mean that woman is at the beach.

premise: Two older men are standing and playing musical instruments.
hypothesis: Two old friends jam together with happy smiles.
explanation_1: The men may not be friends and they may not be happy.

premise: A mustachioed man operates a piece of heavy construction equipment from the cab.
hypothesis: A man is riding a bicycle.
explanation_1: A man cannot be riding a bicycle while operating equipment.

premise: Two young children stand in a field and interact with each other.
hypothesis: Three teenagers are playing in the field.
explanation_1: There can be either two or three boys

premise: An elderly woman sitting in the window of a stone building
hypothesis: A woman is walking.
explanation_1: Walking is not sitting.

premise: The beagle is walking on the beach at the waterline.
hypothesis: The dog is swimming in the water
explanation_1: walking and swimming are different actions

premise: A view of a crowded tent, with several men visible sitting along a table or counter, that has a pitcher of water and some coffee cups on it.
hypothesis: The men are dancing.
explanation_1: men sitting cannot be men dancing at the same time

premise: Man checking out a body of water from inside latticework.
hypothesis: The man is outside on a hike.
explanation_1: A man who is checking out a body of water from inside cannot also be outside.

premise: Small boy in striped shirt sliding out of green tube
hypothesis: A young girl is playing with her dolls.
explanation_1: One usually cannot be both a boy and a girl at the same time.

premise: two women looking at menus with waiter at table
hypothesis: A man and woman is holding hands.
explanation_1: Looking at menus and holding hands are different.
